myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_smtp_gmail_basic.php:</html>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:This release of PHPMailer (v5.0.0) sets a new milestone in the development
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:cycle of PHPMailer. First, class.phpmailer.php has a small footprint (65.7 Kb),
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:while class.smtp.php is even smaller than before (at only 25.0 Kb).<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:We have maintained all functionality and added Exception handling unique to
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:PHP 5/6.<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:There is only one function that has been removed: that is getFile(). The reason
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:for this is that getFile() became a wrapper for the PHP function 'file_get_contents()'
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:and nothing more. Rather than burden the class with a function already available
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:in PHP, we decided to remove it.<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:Our new Exception handling provides your own scripts far more power than ever.<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:We have also enhanced the "packaging" of PHPMailer with an entirely new set of 
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:examples. Included are both basic and advanced examples showing how you can take
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:advantage of PHP Exception handling to improve your own scripts.<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:A few things to note about PHPMailer:
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:<ul>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  <li>the use of $mail-&gt;AltBody is completely optional. If not used, PHPMailer
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  will use the HTML text with htmlentities().<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  We also highly recommend using HTML2Text authored by Jon Abernathy. The class description
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  and download can be viewed at: http://www.chuggnutt.com/html2text.php.
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  </li>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  <li>there is no specific code to define image or attachment types ... that is handled
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  automatically by PHPMailer when it parses the images</li>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:</ul>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:A note to users that want to use SMTP with PHPMailer. The most common problems are:
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:<ul>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  <li>wrong port ... most ISP (Internet Service Providers) will not allow relaying through
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:    their servers. If that's the case with your ISP, try using port 26.
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  </li>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  <li>wrong authentication information (username and/or password) ... don't forget that
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:    many servers require the account name to be in the format of the full email address.
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  </li>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  <li>... if these tips do not get your SMTP settings working, we have a debug mode
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:    for helping you determine the problem. Insert this after $mail->IsSMTP();<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:    $mail->SMTPDebug  = 2;  // enables SMTP debug information (for testing)<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:    note that a setting of 2 will display all errors and messages generated by the SMTP
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:    server<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:  </li>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:</ul>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:Our examples all use an HTML file in the /examples folder. To see what the email SHOULD
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:look like in your HTML compatible email viewer: <a href="contents.html">click here</a><br>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:From the PHPMailer team:<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:Author: Andy Prevost (codeworxtech) codeworxtech@users.sourceforge.net (and Project Administrator)<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/index.html:Author: Marcus Bointon (coolbru) coolbru@users.sourceforge.net<br />
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:<html>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:<head>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:<title>PHPMailer - Sendmail advanced test</title>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:</head>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:<body>
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:<?php
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:require_once('../class.phpmailer.php');
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:$mail = new PHPMailer(true); // the true param means it will throw exceptions on errors, which we need to catch
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:$mail->IsSendmail(); // telling the class to use SendMail transport
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:try {
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:  $mail->AddReplyTo('name@yourdomain.com', 'First Last');
myngl_myngl/PHPMailer/examples/test_sendmail_advanced.php:  $mail->AddAddress('whoto@otherdomain.com', 'John Doe');

myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:function myngl_activities_page() {
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:  $description_mapping = array(
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'visiting_lobby' => "Visit lobby",
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'visiting_social' => "Visit lounge",
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'opening_ugc_win' => "View UGC window",
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'opening_pov_win' => "View POV window",
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'visiting_theate' => "Visit theater",
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'visiting_activi' => "Visit playroom",
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'playroom_activi' => "Play game",
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'sending_ct_msg' => "Send chat message",
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'upload_ugc'=>"Upload UGC content",
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:  );
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:  global $user;
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:  $activities = array();
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:  $result = db_query("  SELECT * FROM {myngl_rewards_history} 
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:                        WHERE user_id = :uid " .
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:                        //GROUP BY description  //commented out by Ming
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:                        "ORDER BY timestamp DESC ", array(':uid' => $user->uid));
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:  foreach ($result as $r) {
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:    if (date('Ymd') == date('Ymd', $r->timestamp)) {
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      $day = 'Today';
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:    } elseif (date('Ymd', time() - 86400) == date('Ymd', $r->timestamp)) {
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      $day = 'Yesterday';
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:    } else {
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      $day = floor((time() - $r->timestamp) / 86400).' DAYS AGO';
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:    }
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:    $activities[] = array(
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'date' => $r->timestamp,
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'day' => $day,
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'description' => (isset($description_mapping[$r->description]))?$description_mapping[$r->description]:$r->description,
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:      'points' => $r->points,
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:    );
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:  }
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:  $output = theme('myngl_activities', array('activities' => $activities));
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:  return $output;
myngl_activities/myngl_activities.module:}

myngl_theater/myngl_theater.module: * Recieves users questions.

myngl_theater/myngl_theater.module:  $k = db_insert('myngl_theater_question')->fields(
myngl_theater/myngl_theater.module:    array(
myngl_theater/myngl_theater.module:      'myngl_id' => $myngl_id,
myngl_theater/myngl_theater.module:      'user_id'  => $from_user_id,
myngl_theater/myngl_theater.module:      'question' => $_POST['question'],
myngl_theater/myngl_theater.module:      'question_date' => time(),
myngl_theater/myngl_theater.module:    )
myngl_theater/myngl_theater.module:  )->execute();
myngl_theater/myngl_theater.module:}

myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:   $repeatable_array = array(

myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:      'visiting_social' => 0,

myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    myngl_rewards_add_helper($user_id, $myngl_id, $activity_field_name, $points);
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  }
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  else {
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    $result = db_query('SELECT id FROM {myngl_rewards_history} WHERE
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:                        myngl_id = :myngl_id AND
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:                        description = :description AND
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:                        user_id = :user_id',

myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:                          ':user_id' => $user_id,
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:                        )
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:                      );

myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    }
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  }
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  echo myngl_rewards_total_points($user_id, $myngl_id);

myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    )

myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:function myngl_rewards_question_submit($myngl_id, $user_id, $selected_reward_id) {
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  /* content of $_POST
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  Array(
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    [myngl_id] => 2
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    [user_id] => 1
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    [question-0] => 30 to 40
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    [question-1] => 5' to 5'6"
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    [form_build_id] => form-5TefKFQIWSUQkhqCjyzCqVivaCcflpBVIwb2HQeWDAA
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    [form_token] => m_uOVr-6aXfMSKch46ArYl0P6dC_FJF-lGISLSN8Mf0
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    [form_id] => myngl_myngl_post_questions_form
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  )
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  */
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  $q_arr = array();
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  foreach ($_POST as $k => $val) {
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    if (preg_match('/question/', $k)) {
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:      $q_arr[$k] = $val;
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:    }
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  }
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  $answers_for_user = serialize($q_arr);
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  $invitee = _myngl_myngl_get_invitee_id($myngl_id, $user_id);
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  $invitee->field_myngl_tagline['und'][0]['value'] = $v['tagline'];
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  $invitee->field_post_question_answer['und'][0]['value'] = $answers_for_user;
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  $invitee->save();
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  myngl_rewards_redeem($user_id, $myngl_id, $selected_reward_id);
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:}
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:/**

myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:function myngl_rewards_invitee_redeem($myngl_id) {
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:  $result = db_query('SELECT user_id, timestamp, reward_id, reward_title
myngl_rewards/myngl_rewards.module:                      FROM {myngl_rewards_redeem} WHERE

myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:function myngl_chat_group_create($myngl_id){
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  //Get the largest chat group id number
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  $result = db_query('SELECT chat_id FROM {myngl_chat_group_chat_id_counter} WHERE
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:                        myngl_id = :myngl_id ',
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:                        array(
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:                          ':myngl_id' => $myngl_id,
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:                        )
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:                      );
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  $chat_id = -1;
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  if ($result->rowCount()==0){
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:    $chat_id = 0;
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:    db_insert('myngl_chat_group_chat_id_counter')->fields(
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:      array(
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:        'myngl_id'      => $myngl_id,
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:        'chat_id'       => $chat_id,
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:      )
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:    )->execute();
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  }
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  else {
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:    $chat_id = $result->fetchObject()->chat_id + 1;
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:    db_update('myngl_chat_group_chat_id_counter')->fields(
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:        array(
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:          'chat_id' => $chat_id,
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:        )
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:      )->condition('myngl_id', $myngl_id, '=')
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:      ->execute();
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  }
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  $selected_invitees = $_POST['selected_invitees'];
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  $users = array();
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  foreach($selected_invitees as $invitee_id){
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:    $loaded_user = user_load($invitee_id);
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:    $name = $loaded_user->field_first_name['und'][0]['value'] . " " . $loaded_user->field_last_name['und'][0]['value'];
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:    $users[$invitee_id] = $name;
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:    $query = db_insert('myngl_chat_group')->fields(
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:      array(
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:      'myngl_id'    => $myngl_id,
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:      'chat_id'      => $chat_id,
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:      'user_id'     => $invitee_id,
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:      )
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:    )->execute();
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  }
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  // Return json objec with the chat_id
myngl_chat/myngl_chat.module:  $response_array['status'] = 'success';

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:function myngl_event_exit_page($nid = NULL) {

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  // $age: 0 = social-area, 1 = theater, 2 = playroom
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $page = intval($page);
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  // Convert ms to s;
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $time_passed = $time_passed / 1000;
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $alert_collection_eids = db_query("SELECT field_myngl_alerts_value

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  }
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $msgs = array();
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $keys = array();
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  //$eids = array();
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  foreach ($alert_collection_eids as $eid){
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    //$eids[] = $eid->field_myngl_alerts_value;

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:                    'message' => $entity->field_message['und'][0]['safe_value'],
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:                    'duration' => $entity->field_duration['und'][0]['value']);
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    }
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  }

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    }
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    else if (!isset($keys[$i+1])){ // end of the array

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    }

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:      $msg = $msgs[$i];

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    }
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    else {

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  }

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  }

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:function myngl_event_update_users_in_lounge($myngl_id){

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:                      leave_time > :time",

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:function myngl_event_lounge_redirect_to_theater($myngl_id){
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  // Get the dates of the events, convert to timestamp and find the index of the nearst past start time.
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $result = db_query("SELECT field_myngl_dates_value FROM field_data_field_myngl_dates
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:                      WHERE entity_id = $myngl_id");
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  foreach($result as $r){
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    $dates[] = myngl_timing_strtotime($r->field_myngl_dates_value);
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  }
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $now = time();
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  rsort($dates);
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $this_date_index = 0;
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  while($this_date_index< count($dates)&& $dates[$this_date_index] > $now){
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    $this_date_index++;

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:function myngl_event_event_ends($nid){
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $result = db_query("SELECT field_show_pov_and_ugc_borders_value FROM field_data_field_show_pov_and_ugc_borders
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:                      WHERE entity_id = $nid")->fetchField();
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  if ($result ==1) {
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    return drupal_json_output(0);
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  }
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  // Get the dates of the events, convert to timestamp and find the index of the nearst past start time.
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $result = db_query("SELECT field_myngl_dates_value FROM field_data_field_myngl_dates
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:                      WHERE entity_id = $nid");
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  foreach($result as $r){
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    $dates[] = myngl_timing_strtotime($r->field_myngl_dates_value); // Time is stored as UTC in the table,so it's always 5 hours.
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  }
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $now = time(); //adjust from UTC to edt/est
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  rsort($dates);
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $this_date_index = 0;
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  while($this_date_index< count($dates)&& $dates[$this_date_index] > $now){
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    $this_date_index++;
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  }
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  $field_event_length = db_query("SELECT field_event_length_value FROM
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:                                       field_data_field_event_length WHERE
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:                                       entity_id = $nid")->fetchField() * 60;
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  return drupal_json_output(($now - $dates[$this_date_index] > $field_event_length)?1:0);
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:}

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  //myngl_event_participant_status($myngl_id, $user_id, $status);

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:                            ":uid"=> $user_id));

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:          'most_recent_status' => 1
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:        )
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:      )->execute();
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:  }

myngl_event/myngl_event.module:    if ($r->room == $status){
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:      db_update('myngl_participant_room_record')->fields(
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:        array(
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:          'leave_time' => time() +20,
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:        )
myngl_event/myngl_event.module:      )->condition('id', $r->id, '=')
